com.turn.shapeshifter

Interface Schema

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoSchema, NamedSchema

    public interface Schema
    A self-descriptive, two-way transform between a JSON object and a Protocol Buffer message.
    Author:
    jsilland
    See Also:
    JSON Schema, Protocol Buffers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Descriptors.Descriptor getDescriptor()
      Returns the Protocol Buffer descriptor on which this schema is based.
      ShapeshifterProtos.JsonSchema getJsonSchema(ReadableSchemaRegistry registry)
      Returns the JSON Schema which describes the JSON payloads this schema is able to parse and serialize.
      Parser getParser()
      Returns a parser able to read JSON content, as configured by this instance.
      Serializer getSerializer()
      Returns a serializer able to generate JSON content, as configured by this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getParser

        Parser getParser()
        Returns a parser able to read JSON content, as configured by this instance.

      • getSerializer

        Serializer getSerializer()
        Returns a serializer able to generate JSON content, as configured by this instance.

      • getJsonSchema

        ShapeshifterProtos.JsonSchema getJsonSchema(ReadableSchemaRegistry registry)
                                            throws JsonSchemaException
        Returns the JSON Schema which describes the JSON payloads this schema is able to parse and serialize.
        Parameters:
        registry - may contain custom schemas for other Protocol Buffer types refered to by this instance
        Throws:
        JsonSchemaException - in case the schema cannot be generated

      • getDescriptor

        Descriptors.Descriptor getDescriptor()
        Returns the Protocol Buffer descriptor on which this schema is based.
